parameters.name: x-request-id
parameters.description: 36 characters unique ID used for traceability purpose. If provided on a request, the same value is echoed back. If not provided on a request, API generates and returns UUID.

description.description: More information on the problem and solution. Or, the error message from backend.
description.example: ORIGINAL ERROR: E1234 ORIGINAL ERROR MESSAGE

traceId.description: More information on the problem and solution. Or, the error message from backend.
traceId.example: ORIGINAL ERROR: E1234 ORIGINAL ERROR MESSAGE
